definitions.definition: The state, or kinship of being sisters .
The quality of being sisterly ; sisterly companionship ; especially, the sense that women have of being in solidarity with one another.
The idea of universal experience amongst women, regardless of other traits or factors. (Considered obsolete in third-wave feminism .)

main_definition: The state, or kinship of being sisters .
secondary_definitions: The quality of being sisterly ; sisterly companionship ; especially, the sense that women have of being in solidarity with one another.
( feminism ) The idea of universal experience amongst women, regardless of other traits or factors. (Considered obsolete in third-wave feminism .)
